mapper.select: select R.ROLEID as GROUPID,R.ROLENAME as GROUPNAME,G.GROUPTYPE from AU_ROLEINFO R inner join AU_GROUP_RELATION G on R.ROLEID = G.GROUPID where G.USERID=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and G.GROUPTYPE='role'
select userId from AU_GROUP_RELATION G where G.groupId=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and G.GROUPTYPE='role'
SELECT ROLEID AS GROUPID,ROLENAME AS GROUPNAME ,'role' AS GROUPTYPE FROM AU_ROLEINFO WHERE ROLEID=#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
